description: Number of letters in n in Brazilian Portuguese (not counting spaces).
links: Index entries for sequences related to number of letters in n
formula: Zero, um, dois, tres, quatro, cinco, seis, sete, oito, nove, dez, onze, doze, treze, quatorze, quinze, dezesseis, dezessete, dezoito, dezenove, vinte, vinte e um, vinte e dois, vinte e tres, vinte e quatro, vinte e cinco, vinte e seis, vinte e sete, vinte e oito, vinte e nove, trinta, ...
author: _Odimar Fabeny_, Oct 22 2000
extensions: Missing a(0)=4 (error noticed by Kevin Ryde) and terms beyond n=30 added by _M. F. Hasler_, Aug 24 2012
